Next Finish Tired of Typing? Lexicon is an optical character recognition application in which you can extract printed text from images.You can use your camera to take a photo or open an image from your storage Enable Edge Screen Edge screen is a floating widget used to extract text from any screen on your device

To Enable: Go to Settings and Turn on "Enable Edge" switch Save your Text Save the extracted text. So don't bother about losing your favourite passages Share Text Share the extracted with third party apps. So that you can edit or make changes there Tap here to Open Settings Success Edge Screen successfully enabled. Swipe (Right-to-Left) on the transparent bar to reveal Edge Screen

Click Next to continue
